name: Dhawa Yura Kyoto
description: Travel back in time to a mysterious hideaway in the ancient capital city of Kyoto. Contemporary design meets historical features in this intimate boutique hotel near the Kamo River, telling the story of an era that marked Japanese history with its blend of old and new, East and West. Located in Sanjo in the heart of Kyoto, Dhawa Yura sits within walking distance of temples, shrines, shopping, cuisine and museums.accorhotels.com

name: Kabin Kyoto
description: Conveniently situated in the centre of Kyoto, KABIN Kyoto provides air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 3-star hotel offers a bar. The accommodation features a concierge service, luggage storage space and currency exchange for guests. Guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a seating area, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. Featuring a private bathroom with a bidet and free toiletries, certain rooms at KABIN Kyoto also offer a city view. At the accommodation each room is equipped with bed linen and towels. Languages spoken at the reception include English, Spanish, French and Japanese, and guests are invited to request guidance on the area when needed. Popular points of interest near KABIN Kyoto include Gion Shijo Station, Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall and Sanjusangen-do Temple. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 45 km from the hotel.

name: The Blossom Kyoto
description: Situated conveniently in Kyoto, THE BLOSSOM KYOTO offers air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage space and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel, all rooms come with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a shared bathroom, bed linen and towels. The units will provide guests with a fridge. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at THE BLOSSOM KYOTO. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include TKP Garden City Kyoto, Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall and Gion Shijo Station. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 44 km from THE BLOSSOM KYOTO.

name: Asai Kyoto Shijo
description: Well situated in the centre of Kyoto, ASAI Kyoto Shijo offers air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. The property is set 1.5 km from Gion Shijo Station, 1.7 km from Kyoto Station and 2.2 km from Sanjusangen-do Temple. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage space and currency exchange for guests. The units at the hotel come with a TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. All guest rooms feature a desk. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes à la carte, American and Asian options. Popular points of interest near ASAI Kyoto Shijo include Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall, Kyoto International Manga Museum and TKP Garden City Kyoto. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 45 km from the accommodation.

name: Sequence Kyoto Gojo
description: Well situated in the centre of Kyoto, sequence KYOTO GOJO offers air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. Guests can have a drink at the bar. All units in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. The units at sequence KYOTO GOJO come with a TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Guests staying at sequence KYOTO GOJO have access to the on-site wellness area which includes a sauna. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall, Kyoto International Manga Museum and TKP Garden City Kyoto. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 44 km from sequence KYOTO GOJO.

name: Hyatt Regency Kyoto
description: The stylish Hyatt Regency offers spacious rooms, free Wi-Fi at the lobby and 3 restaurants on just a 5-minute drive from Kyoto Station. It features a fitness centre, spa services and rental bicycles. Private parking is offered on site at an additional charge. The elegant rooms are decorated in light natural tones, and furnished with a 32-inch plasma TV, a DVD player and a safe. A minibar, nightwear and slippers are provided. Guests can treat themselves to shiatsu, acupuncture, aromatherapy and other treatments at Riraku Spa. The Kyoto Regency Hyatt offers a 24-hour concierge, a souvenir shop and baby-sitting services. Restaurant cafe 33 features cafe cuisine, while Touzan serves Japanese cuisine and Trattoria Sette offers Italian food. The Hyatt has a bar, a pastry shop and room service. The Hyatt Regency Kyoto is a 5-minute walk away from Shichijo Station. It is a less than 5-minute walk away from Kyoto National Museum and Sanjusangen-do Temple. From Kyoto Station, an express train can take guests to Kansai International Airport in 75 minutes. Limousine buses also depart from Kyoto Station for Osaka Itami Airport and the bus ride takes approximately 55 minutes.

name: The Royal Park Hotel Kyoto Sanjo
description: The Royal Park Hotel Kyoto Sanjo features stylish modern accommodations with free wired internet access. The hotel offers massages and concierge services, as well as a bar and a buffet restaurant with savory dishes. Kyoto Shiyakusho-mae Subway Station and Sanjo Keihan Station are both within a 3-minute walk away. The air-conditioned rooms boast smooth colours, stylish lamps and a flat-screen TV. Each private bathroom features a spacious shower area with a bathtub. A fridge and an electric kettle with green tea are provided. The Royal Park Hotel Kyoto Sanjo is a 20-minute walk from Kyoto Imperial Palace and a 10-minute public bus ride from Nijo Castle. The Gion area and Yasaka Shrine are within a 15-minute walk away. Luggage storage and a safety deposit are offered at the 24-hour front desk. A coin-launderette is on-site and dry cleaning services can be requested as well. Laptop rentals and drink/snack vending machines are available. Featuring an IKA Culinary Olympic rewarded chef, Monsieur Ito serves Western dishes using local ingredients. Late-night drinks are available at the stylish bar. There are also a wide selection of restaurants around the hotel.

name: The Gate Hotel Kyoto Takasegawa by Hulic
description: The Gate Hotel Kyoto Takasegawa by Hulic features a restaurant, fitness centre, a bar and shared lounge in Kyoto. The property is located 1.3 km from Samurai Kembu Kyoto, 1.6 km from Kyoto International Manga Museum and 2.1 km from Shoren-in Temple. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel, each room comes with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. A breakfast in the set menu is available daily at The Gate Hotel Kyoto Takasegawa by Hulic. The accommodation offers a terrace. Sanjusangen-do Temple is 2.4 km from The Gate Hotel Kyoto Takasegawa by Hulic, while Kiyomizu-dera Temple is 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 45 km from the hotel.

name: Park Hotel Kyoto
description: Featuring a fitness centre, a restaurant as well as a bar, Park Hotel Kyoto is located in the centre of Kyoto, 300 metres from Kyoto International Manga Museum. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage space and free WiFi. Certain units at the property include a terrace with a city view. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Nijo Castle, Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall and Samurai Kembu Kyoto. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 46 km from Park Hotel Kyoto.

name: Ace Hotel Kyoto
description: Ace Hotel Kyoto features free bikes, fitness centre, a garden and terrace in Kyoto. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation provides an ATM, a concierge service and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel every room comes with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Ace Hotel Kyoto the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, American or vegetarian options. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Kyoto International Manga Museum, Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall and Gion Shijo Station. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 46 km from Ace Hotel Kyoto.

name: The Royal Park Hotel Iconic Kyoto
description: Attractively situated in the centre of Kyoto, The Royal Park Hotel Iconic Kyoto features air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 5-star hotel offers a bar. The property is non-smoking and is situated 200 metres from Kyoto International Manga Museum. Rooms have a safety deposit box, while certain rooms are fitted with a balcony. The rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. Guests at the hotel can enjoy an Italian breakfast. Speaking English and Japanese, staff at the 24-hour front desk can help you plan your stay. Popular points of interest near The Royal Park Hotel Iconic Kyoto include Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall, Samurai Kembu Kyoto and Nijo Castle. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 46 km from the accommodation.

name: KAYA Kyoto Nijo Castle, BW Signature Collection
description: KAYA Kyoto Nijo Castle, BW Signature Collection is an elegant boutique hotel in the ancient heart of Kyoto, Japan’s Imperial capital and cultural haven. Nestled in a quiet residential street in the city’s Nakagyo Ward, this stylish hotel is surrounded by ancient attractions, local restaurants, independent shops, leafy parks and floral gardens. Travelers can uncover UNESCO World Heritage-listed landmarks including Nijo Castle, which dates from the 1600s and transports visitors back to the Edo Period and the era of the shoguns. The famous Imperial Palace is also just a short distance away. This low-rise hotel blends local grace with international standards to create outstanding experiences. Each guest room is designed in a contemporary Japanese style with organic amenities and state-of-the-art technology, including complimentary Wi-Fi, and every guest is provided with a traditional house dress to wear to breakfast. Visitors can also unwind in the gym and dine at the restaurant, which serves exceptional French cuisine. Whether you are seeking a cultural escape or a city break, KAYA Kyoto Nijo Castle, BW Signature Collection is the perfect option for your next Japanese adventure.bestwestern.com

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Kyoto Higashiyama
description: A celebration of Japanese Kyoto culture, our hotel is just across the Gojo Ohashi Bridge within walking distance of the city’s world-class heritage sites. Osaka, Nara and Kobe, one of the largest metropolitan areas in the world, is just a 15-minute train ride away. We offer onsite dining featuring a selection of local Kyoto cuisine.Hilton

name: Marufukuro
description: Featuring a shared lounge, a restaurant as well as a bar, Marufukuro is located in the centre of Kyoto, 1 km from Sanjusangen-do Temple. Located around 1.1 km from TKP Garden City Kyoto, the hotel with free WiFi is also 1.4 km away from Kyoto Station. Certain rooms at the property include a terrace with a city view. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Selected rooms are equipped with a kitchen with a microwave. At Marufukuro each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. American and Asian breakfast options are available daily at the accommodation. Speaking English and Japanese at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help. Popular points of interest near Marufukuro include Gion Shijo Station, Kiyomizu-dera Temple and Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 44 km from the hotel.

name: The Prince Kyoto Takaragaike, Autograph Collection
address: Takaragaike, Sakyo-Ku, (1092-2 Iwakura-Hataeda-Cho) Kyoto-Shi, Kyoto, Kyoto 606-8505
description: Reserve a unique, luxurious hotel stay in Japan at The Prince Kyoto Takaragaike, Autograph Collection and admire the gentle landscape that surrounds us, consisting of 36 mountains from the iconic Higashiyama Mountain Range. For over a thousand years, the Rakuhoku region of Kyoto, Japan, has been known as a resort for aristocrats that showcases stunning natural beauty and pristine waters. Our luxury hotel in Kyoto blends in with these peaceful surroundings, creating a refuge from the hustle and bustle of Kyoto City. Enjoy artfully designed details from the graceful, sweeping lines of the hotel’s architecture, designed by the late Japanese master architect Togo Murano, to the refined hospitality offered to each guest who visits us in our Kyoto, Japan, hotel. Luxury and comfort await in the exquisite rooms and suites of The Prince Kyoto Takaragaike, Autograph Collection.Marriott

name: Candeo Hotels Kyoto Karasuma Rokkaku
description: Attractively set in Kyoto, Candeo Hotels Kyoto Karasuma Rokkaku features air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a bar. The property is around 2.3 km from Nijo Castle, 2.3 km from TKP Garden City Kyoto and 3.1 km from Sanjusangen-do Temple. The property is non-smoking and is situated 500 metres from Kyoto International Manga Museum. The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. Rooms come with a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. An Asian breakfast is available each morning at Candeo Hotels Kyoto Karasuma Rokkaku. The accommodation offers 4-star accommodation with a sauna and hot tub. Speaking English, Japanese and Norwegian, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area at the reception. Popular points of interest near Candeo Hotels Kyoto Karasuma Rokkaku include Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall, Gion Shijo Station and Samurai Kembu Kyoto. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 45 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Granvia Kyoto
address: JR Kyoto Station, Karasuma Chuo-Guchi, Kyoto 600-8216
description: Ideally located within Kyoto Station, Hotel Granvia Kyoto boasts an indoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and 9 dining options. The hotel offers spacious rooms with chic décor and modern facilities. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property. Rooms have large windows and are fitted with an LCD TV, extra-long beds and a bathroom. A minibar and an electric kettle are provided. Guests at the Kyoto Granvia can relax in the steam room or the hot tub. The hotel features over 1000 art works. It is close to Kyoto Station’s shopping mall and museum. Extra charges apply to use the swimming pool and fitness centre. Cafe Restaurant Le Temps serves light dishes and a range of restaurants offer Japanese specialities. Granvia Hotel features a bar and provides in-room dining until midnight. Hotel Granvia Kyoto is just a 3-minute walk to Kyoto Tower. Popular Arashiyama area and Fushimi Inari Shrine with hundreds of red gates are both within a 15-minute train ride from the Kyoto Station. Iconic Kiyomizu Temple is a 20-minute bus or taxi ride away.

name: Gion Elite Terrace
description: Located in Kyoto, 800 metres from Gion Shijo Station, Gion Elite Terrace provides accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers luggage storage space. The hotel features a sauna, a concierge service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Guest rooms at Gion Elite Terrace are equipped with a seating area. A buffet, continental or Asian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. The accommodation provides a laundry service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Popular points of interest near Gion Elite Terrace include Samurai Kembu Kyoto, Kiyomizu-dera Temple and Shoren-in Temple. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 46 km from the hotel.

name: Bna Alter Museum
description: Situated in the centre of Kyoto, BnA Alter Museum is set 500 metres from Gion Shijo Station and 1.3 km from Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall. Featuring a bar, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features nightclub and a 24-hour front desk. All rooms in the hotel are fitted with a kettle. Every room comes with a safety deposit box and some rooms also boast river views. At BnA Alter Museum the rooms come with bed linen and towels. An Italian, vegetarian or vegan breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Samurai Kembu Kyoto, Sanjusangen-do Temple and Kiyomizu-dera Temple. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 45 km from BnA Alter Museum.

name: Hotel Il Verde Kyoto
description: Ideally situated in the Shimogyo Ward district of Kyoto, Hotel IL Verde Kyoto is situated 1.2 km from Sanjusangen-do Temple, 1.3 km from Kyoto Station and 1.7 km from Gion Shijo Station. The 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. The property is 2 km from the city centre and 1 km from TKP Garden City Kyoto. All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. Hotel IL Verde Kyoto features some rooms with garden views, and the rooms have a kettle. At the accommodation the rooms include bed linen and towels. An American breakfast is available each morning at Hotel IL Verde Kyoto. Round-the-clock assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak English, Hindi, Japanese and Korean. Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall is 1.5 km from the hotel, while Kiyomizu-dera Temple is 2.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 44 km from Hotel IL Verde Kyoto.

name: Hotel Rings Kyoto
address: 393, Kabutoyacho, Sakaimachi-Dori Rokkaku Sagaru, Nakagyo-ku, Kawaramachi, Kyoto, Japan, Kyoto 604-8114
description: Conveniently situated in the centre of Kyoto, HOTEL RINGS KYOTO provides air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The property is non-smoking and is located less than 1 km from Kyoto International Manga Museum. Guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. At HOTEL RINGS KYOTO each room is equipped with bed linen and towels. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast is available daily at the property. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Gion Shijo Station, Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall and Samurai Kembu Kyoto. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 46 km from HOTEL RINGS KYOTO.

name: Moxy Kyoto Nijo
description: Open your eyes and open your mind at Moxy Kyoto Nijo in the Kyoto Nijo city historic district, near the World Heritage site of Nijo Castle. At our downtown hotel, see how we pair a bright and airy lobby with a medley of contemporary finishings. The ''Plug and Meet'' gathering areas style it up with ergonomic seating, large writing walls, 56-inch televisions and a booming video wall, so you wow your colleagues with an off-the-rails presentation. Wake up in Kyoto to a healthy continental breakfast, hit our hotel fitness center to stay lean and wind down at our an evening bar that serves up local brews and wines by the glass. Plus, events like DJ Nights and Kyoto culture workshops are held at the Lobby Bar regularly. And when it is time to call it a day, kick back in your Kyoto hotel room with a 50-inch flat screen television, built-in USB ports and free Wi-Fi. Fun and joy are yours when you book Moxy Kyoto Nijo, home to all that's hip and happening in Japan.Marriott

name: Abita Hotel Kyoto Kamogawa
description: Abita Hotel Kyoto Kamogawa has free bikes, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Kyoto. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is situated less than 1 km from Sanjusangen-do Temple. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Abita Hotel Kyoto Kamogawa features some units with river views, and the rooms are equipped with a kettle. At the accommodation the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at Abita Hotel Kyoto Kamogawa can enjoy an American or an Asian breakfast. Guests at the hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Kyoto, like cycling. Popular points of interest near Abita Hotel Kyoto Kamogawa include TKP Garden City Kyoto, Gion Shijo Station and Kyoto Station. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 44 km from the accommodation.

name: Villa Sanjo Muromachi Kyoto
description: Opening in July 2016 and located within a 5-minute walk from Karasuma Oike Subway Station on the Karasuma Line and Tozai Line, Villa Sanjomuromachi KYOTO offers guests a relaxing accommodation and free WiFi throughout the property. Carpeted rooms at Villa Sanjomuromachi KYOTO feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, air conditioning/heating and an electric kettle. The rooms have a private bathroom fitted with a bath. Extras include bath robes, slippers and a hairdryer, and free toiletries are also available in all rooms. Laundry services are available at a surcharge. The property is run by a city guide publisher and concierge services are available. Western-style breakfast is served upon request at the guest rooms or at the lounge seats located on the ground floor. Nishiki Market located in downtown Kyoto is a 10-minute walk from the property, while Nijo Castle is a 10-minute walk away. Kyoto International Comic Museum is a mere 5-minute walk away.

name: Kyoto Garden Palace
address: 605 Tatsumae-cho, Shimochojamachi Agaru, Karasuma-dori, Kamigyo-ku, Kyoto 602-0912
description: Right in front of Kyoto Imperial Palace, Kyoto Garden Palace offers free WiFi in all areas of the hotel. The hotel features a restaurant, and it provides bicycle rentals and massage services. Rooms at Garden Palace are air-conditioned and fitted with an LCD TV with satellite channels, a fridge and a green-tea maker. Japanese Yukata robes are provided for all guests. Guests can unwind with a massage, visit the hairdresser or browse in the hotel shop. Japanese specialities can be sampled with a garden view at restaurant Hanagoyomi, while Restaurant Brillante serves a variety of Western dishes. Drinks can be enjoyed at the tea lounge. The hotel is a 1-minute walk from Kyoto Gyoen Garden and a 20-minute walk from Nijo Castle. Marutamachi Subway Station is an 8-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Okura Kyoto
description: Hotel Okura's elegant rooms boast spectacular views of Kyoto against the backdrop of the Higashiyama Mountains. In the heart of the city, the hotel treats its guests to a shopping avenue, free Wi-Fi at the lobby and concierge services. Beauty treatments and baby-sitting services are available. Connected to the Shiyakusho-mae Subway Station, Hotel Okura Kyoto is a 5-minute walk from Honno-ji Temple, and a 10-minute walk from Kyoto International Manga Museum. The Takashimaya department store in the shopping district of Shijo Kawaramachi is a 12-minute stroll away. Guests can browse a variety of boutiques at Shopping Avenue Comfort, which includes a hairdresser and a jewellery shop. Okura Hotel offers a charged indoor swimming pool and free parking. A free shuttle and charged luggage delivery is provided to/from its Welcome Lounge at JR Kyoto Station. Luxurious rooms feature neutral colours, extra long beds, a flat-screen TV and a seating area. Guests can lounge in their yukata robe or bathrobe, with drinks from the minibar. Free high-speed wired internet is provided. Boasting panoramic mountain and city views, Sky Restaurant Pittoresque serves French cuisine and wines from its own wine cellar. Hotel Okura Kyoto houses a bakery and a variety of restaurants, including a top-floor buffet restaurant and Kyoto cuisine.

name: Tokyu Stay Kyoto Sanjo-Karasuma
description: Well located in the centre of Kyoto, Tokyu Stay Kyoto Sanjo-Karasuma provides buffet breakfast and free WiFi. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a restaurant. The property is non-smoking and is located 400 metres from Kyoto International Manga Museum. Guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a fridge, a microwave, a kettle, a bidet, free toiletries and a desk. At the hotel each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near Tokyu Stay Kyoto Sanjo-Karasuma include Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall, Nijo Castle and Samurai Kembu Kyoto. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 46 km from the accommodation.

name: The Royal Park Canvas Kyoto Nijo
description: Ideally situated in Kyoto, The Royal Park Canvas - Kyoto Nijo features air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a shared lounge. The property has a bar, as well as a restaurant serving European cuisine. The property is non-smoking and is situated less than 1 km from Nijo Castle. All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. The rooms are fitted with a private bathroom with a bidet, a hairdryer and slippers. All units will provide guests with a fridge. You can play table tennis at this 4-star hotel. Staff speak English and Japanese at the 24-hour front desk. Kyoto International Manga Museum is 1.7 km from The Royal Park Canvas - Kyoto Nijo, while Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall is 2.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 45 km from the accommodation.

name: The Westin Miyako Kyoto
description: The Westin Miyako Kyoto opened in 1890 at the base of Higashiyama in the ancient capital city of Kyoto, Japan. For more than 130 years, our family-friendly hotel has responded to the changing times while respecting its traditions. Now, we open a new chapter in our hotel's history. Expect memorable moments filled with understated elegance, luxury and approachable service when you visit us in Kyoto, Japan. Explore nearby museums, music halls, zoos and many historical temples and shrines, including the Heian Shrine, Nanzenji, Eikando and Ginkakuji. Sample delicious, locally inspired dishes and expertly crafted cocktails in one of our many hotel restaurants. At the end of your day in Kyoto, settle into a well-appointed hotel room or suite with complimentary Wi-Fi, flat-screen TV and 24-hour room service. Experience all Kyoto, Japan, has to offer with your family at The Westin Miyako Kyoto.Marriott

name: Rakuro Kyoto By The Share Hotels
description: Ideally situated in the centre of Kyoto, RAKURO Kyoto by THE SHARE HOTELS features air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 3-star hotel offers luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is situated 700 metres from Kyoto International Manga Museum. All rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. The rooms have a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At RAKURO Kyoto by THE SHARE HOTELS rooms include bed linen and towels. An Asian breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. RAKURO Kyoto by THE SHARE HOTELS offers a sun terrace. Nijo Castle is 1.2 km from the hotel, while Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall is 1.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 47 km from RAKURO Kyoto by THE SHARE HOTELS.

name: Mogana
description: Open from December 2018, MOGANA is situated in Kyoto and features a garden and free WiFi. This hotel offers a 24-hour front desk. Set in the Nakagyo Ward district, the hotel is within 800 metres of Kyoto International Manga Museum. Nijojo-Mae Station is a 5-minute walk, Karasuma Oike Station is an 8-minute walk and Kyoto Station is a 14-minute train ride away. All rooms in the hotel are equipped with a coffee machine. With a private bathroom fitted with a bath and free toiletries, certain units at MOGANA also feature a terrace. The units have a wardrobe. An American breakfast is available each morning at the property. Nijo Castle is 1.2 km from the accommodation, while Samurai Kembu Kyoto is 2.2 km away. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 48 km from the property.

name: Tune Stay Kyoto
description: Located in Kyoto and with Kyoto Station reachable within 500 metres, TUNE STAY KYOTO provides concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers a shared kitchen and luggage storage space. The property is 1.9 km from the city centre and 500 metres from TKP Garden City Kyoto. Selected rooms are equipped with a kitchen with a fridge, a microwave and a stovetop. At the hotel each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Sanjusangen-do Temple is 1.7 km from TUNE STAY KYOTO, while Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall is 1.4 km away. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 43 km from the accommodation.

name: The Gran Resort Elegante Kyoto
description: No description found

name: The Hotel Higashiyama By Kyoto Tokyu Hotel
description: THE HOTEL HIGASHIYAMA by Kyoto Tokyu Hotel has a fitness centre, garden, a terrace and restaurant in Kyoto. With a bar, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and currency exchange for guests. Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. All guest rooms in THE HOTEL HIGASHIYAMA by Kyoto Tokyu Hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an American breakfast. Popular points of interest near THE HOTEL HIGASHIYAMA by Kyoto Tokyu Hotel include Shoren-in Temple, Samurai Kembu Kyoto and Heian Shrine. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 47 km from the hotel.

name: Mercure Kyoto Station
description: Mercure Kyoto Station is the first Mercure brand hotel in the Kansai region. The main lobby features an installation of an origami kemari (Heian era football) made from handmade Japanese paper and a colorful design wall composed of blown glass spheres that is sure to provide an elegant start to your trip.accorhotels.com

name: nol kyoto sanjo
description: Featuring a garden, a shared lounge as well as a bar, nol kyoto sanjo is located in the centre of Kyoto, 600 metres from Kyoto International Manga Museum. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage space and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.4 km from Gion Shijo Station. Guest rooms at the hotel include air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, Blu-ray player, and a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At nol kyoto sanjo each room comes with bed linen and towels. Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall is 1.4 km from the accommodation, while Samurai Kembu Kyoto is 1.2 km away. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 46 km from nol kyoto sanjo.

name: Hotel Canata Kyoto
description: Attractively situated in the Nakagyo Ward district of Kyoto, HOTEL CANATA KYOTO is situated less than 1 km from Nijo Castle, a 12-minute walk from Kyoto International Manga Museum and 2.6 km from Samurai Kembu Kyoto. With a bar, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage for guests. The rooms in the hotel are fitted with a kettle. At HOTEL CANATA KYOTO rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. HOTEL CANATA KYOTO offers a terrace. Kyoto Imperial Palace is 3.4 km from the hotel, while Shoren-in Temple is 3.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 48 km from HOTEL CANATA KYOTO.

name: Fauchon Hotel Kyoto
description: Boasting a fitness centre, a restaurant as well as a bar, Fauchon Hotel Kyoto is set in the centre of Kyoto, 800 metres from Gion Shijo Station. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.1 km from Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall. All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a coffee machine, a bidet, free toiletries and a wardrobe. Each room has a safety deposit box and selected rooms also feature mountain views. At the hotel the rooms come with bed linen and towels. Fauchon Hotel Kyoto offers a continental or American breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Sanjusangen-do Temple, Samurai Kembu Kyoto and TKP Garden City Kyoto. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 45 km from Fauchon Hotel Kyoto.

name: Cross Hotel Kyoto
description: Cross Hotel Kyoto is set in Kawaramachi Sanjo and provides rooms with warm wooden decor featuring Kyoto-style architecture and free WiFi. Hankyu Kawaramachi Station is a 6-minute walk away, while Sanjo Station by tram, Kyoto Shiyakusho-mae Station and Sanjo Keihan Station by metro are all 4-minutes away on foot. The units are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, fridge, a kettle, a hot tub, free toiletries and a wardrobe. Rooms have a private bathroom with a bath, while some rooms also offer mountain views. An American breakfast is available daily at the property. Cross Hotel Kyoto can conveniently provide information at the reception to help guests to get around the area. A designated smoking area is provided at this non-smoking hotel. Nishiki Market and Gion Shirakawa area are 1 km away, while Higashiyama Ward area is 2.3 km away. Fushimi Inari Taisha Shrine is 4.57 km away from the hotel. Itami Airport is 50 km from the property.

name: Hyatt Place Kyoto
description: Hyatt Place KYOTO, locating center of Kyoto, offers modern and classic Japanese experience with historical attractions nearby. Our hotel has direct access to Marutamachi station on city subway line, and Kyoto Imperial Palace and Nijo-jo Castle locates within walking distance from our hotel.Hyatt

name: Soraniwa Terrace Kyoto Bettei
description: Boasting a terrace, a restaurant as well as a bar, Soraniwa Terrace Kyoto Bettei is situated in the centre of Kyoto, 300 metres from Gion Shijo Station. This 5-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.2 km from Samurai Kembu Kyoto. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Soraniwa Terrace Kyoto Bettei rooms come with bed linen and towels. An Asian breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. At Soraniwa Terrace Kyoto Bettei guests are welcome to take advantage of a hot tub and a hot spring bath. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall, Sanjusangen-do Temple and Shoren-in Temple. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 46 km from Soraniwa Terrace Kyoto Bettei.

name: Hotel Nikko Princess Kyoto
description: Receiving 3 black pavilions for five consecutive years on the 2014 to 2018 Michelin Guides, Hotel Nikko Princess Kyoto is a 3-minute walk from Exit 5 of Shijo Subway Station. This 5-star hotel offers a beauty salon, 5 dining options and property-wide free WiFi service. Guestrooms offer spacious European interiors with modern furnishings. Each room is equipped with an air purifier/humidifier, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. A mini-fridge, an electric kettle and nightwear is provided. Guests can refresh in spacious bathtub in the contemporary en suite bathroom. A buffet featuring 70 different breakfast items is available at the Café Restaurant Amber Court in the mornings. Tempura dishes and Japanese meals are available at Sagano, while Chinese cuisines are served at Hisuien. Teppanyaki grills are offered at Hoen restaurant. Guests can enjoy a massage or spa treatment at the beauty salon. Traditional crafts from Kyoto can be purchased from the souvenir shop on site. Tourist information and various services are offered at the concierge desk. Princess Kyoto Nikko Hotel is a 15-minute drive from Nijo Castle and Kiyomizu-dera Temple. The Minamiza Kabuki Theatre is a 20-minute walk and Nishiki food market street is a 7-minute walk away.

name: Rihga Gran Kyoto
description: Ideally set in the centre of Kyoto, Rihga Gran Kyoto offers air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a restaurant. Boasting a bar, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 800 metres from TKP Garden City Kyoto, less than 1 km from Kyoto Station and 1.8 km from Sanjusangen-do Temple. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage space and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel, rooms have a desk. The rooms come with a kettle, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box, while selected rooms also feature a terrace and some have city views. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at Rihga Gran Kyoto. Tofuku-ji Temple is 2.7 km from the accommodation, while Fushimi Inari Taisha Shrine is 3.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 42 km from Rihga Gran Kyoto.

name: Sora Niwa Terrace Kyoto
description: Attractively set in the centre of Kyoto, Sora Niwa Terrace Kyoto features air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers a bar. The property is non-smoking and is situated 400 metres from Gion Shijo Station. The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a seating area, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. The private bathroom is fitted with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Sora Niwa Terrace Kyoto rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an Asian breakfast. At Sora Niwa Terrace Kyoto guests are welcome to take advantage of a hot spring bath. Speaking Arabic, English, Japanese and Chinese at the reception, staff are always on hand to help. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Samurai Kembu Kyoto, Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall and Kyoto International Manga Museum. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 46 km from Sora Niwa Terrace Kyoto.

name: Hotel Banister Kyoto
description: Hotel Banister Kyoto is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Kyoto. The property offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. Facilities like free Wi-Fi in all rooms, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, room service, coffee shop are readily available for you to enjoy. Complimentary tea, towels, carpeting, fireplace, clothes rack can be found in selected guestrooms. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Discover all Kyoto has to offer by making Hotel Banister Kyoto your base.priceline.com

name: Rihga Royal Hotel Kyoto
description: Conveniently located a 7-minute walk from JR Kyoto Train Station, RIHGA Royal Hotel Kyoto is renovated in September 2016 and features 8 restaurants. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and a concierge is available on call. Complimentary shuttle runs between the hotel and JR Kyoto Station. Featuring contemporary decor with Japanese touches, all rooms come with a satellite TV and minibar. An en suite bathroom includes Laura Ashley bath amenities and toothbrushes. Guests will find an electric kettle, hairdryer, air humidifier and purifier in their rooms. Offering panoramic views from the 14th floor, a rotating restaurant, Top of Kyoto, serves authentic French delicacies, while Aoi Teppanyaki Restaurant serves Japanese-style grilled omi Japanese wagyu beef. Chinese dishes and a bar and cafe are also on site. The hotel is only a 5-minute walk from Nishi Hongan-ji Temple. Higashi Hongan-ji Temple and To-ji Temple are within a 20-minute walk. Fushimi Inari Taisha Shrine is a 5-minute train ride, while Kiyomizu-dera and Kinkaku-ji temples can be reached within a 30-minute bus ride.

name: Henn na Hotel Kyoto Hachijoguchi
description: Henn na Hotel Kyoto Hachijoguchi is situated conveniently in the centre of Kyoto, and offers a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. Private parking is available on site. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Henn na Hotel Kyoto Hachijoguchi all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. A buffet, American or Asian breakfast is available every morning at the property. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include TKP Garden City Kyoto, Kyoto Station and Sanjusangen-do Temple. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 43 km from Henn na Hotel Kyoto Hachijoguchi.

name: The Reign Hotel Kyoto
description: Conveniently set in the centre of Kyoto, THE REIGN HOTEL KYOTO provides air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. Guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. Featuring a private bathroom with a bidet and free toiletries, certain rooms at THE REIGN HOTEL KYOTO also offer a city view. At the accommodation each room has bed linen and towels. A buffet breakfast is available daily at THE REIGN HOTEL KYOTO. The hotel offers a sun terrace. Popular points of interest near THE REIGN HOTEL KYOTO include Tofuku-ji Temple, Fushimi Inari Taisha Shrine and TKP Garden City Kyoto. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 41 km from the accommodation.

name: Imu Hotel Kyoto
description: IMU HOTEL KYOTO is situated in Kyoto, 5-minute walk from Shijo-Karasuma Metro Station and Hankyu Karasuma Station. Ideally situated in the Shimogyo Ward district, this hotel offers chic modern rooms and a shared lounge with a cafe and bar. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Free luggage storage is available at the 24-hour front desk.We are offering vegetarian breakfast and dinner at the hotel restaurant, and breakfast is available for hotel guests with additional fee. (Choose from 4 options) From the viewpoint of environmental protection, cleaning during consecutive nights will be done once every 3 nights. (For guests staying 2 nights or more, we will provide towels for the number of nights in advance). Rooms come with air conditioning, fridge, and en suite bathroom with extras including a hairdryer. Speaking Japanese and English at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area. Complimentary drinks and tatami (woven-straw) flooring is available for guests to relax. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 38 km from the accommodation.

name: Roman Kan
description: No description found

name: The Chapter Kyoto, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel
description: Located in Japan’s historical and cultural hub, our Kyoto, Japan, hotel is set to showcase the hidden gems of the city for travelers and locals who seek out independent experiences and crave a connection with the community when traveling. The hotel features 203 elegantly appointed guestrooms including two signature suites. Drawing inspiration from Japanese tea ceremonies, the guestrooms feature key elements of Japanese tea rooms and are reimagined with a modern interpretation to offer functional beauty and comfort with a sense of tradition. The hotel also has a fully-equipped, 24/7 fitness center as well as a traditional Japanese public bath for guests to relax and rejuvenate after a long day of exploring. Discover our range of Kyoto, Japan, hotel deals before your next visit to The Chapter Kyoto, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel.Marriott

name: En Hotel Kyoto
address: Shimogyo-ku Nishinotoin Dori Shijo Minami Hairu, Kyoto 600-8472
description: Situated in the historic residential area in Kyoto, EN HOTEL Kyoto is simple accommodation just a 5-minute walk from Karasuma and Shijo stations. Gion Festival’s parade takes place in the area. Free WiFi is available in the rooms. Guests can request in-room massages at an extra charge, or leave their luggage at the 24-hour front desk. Coin launderette and drink vending machines are available on site. Each simple room at EN HOTEL Kyoto comes with a flat-screen TV and a fridge. The hotel is just a 2-minute walk from Shijo Nishinotoin bus stop. Yasaka Shrine is a 13-minute bus ride away, while Nijo Castle is a 17-minute bus ride from the property. JR Kyoto Station can be reached within a 10-minute subway ride. The lounge area offers bread for breakfast.

name: Kyoto Tower Hotel
description: Kyoto Tower Hotel is a popular choice amongst travelers in Kyoto, whether exploring or just passing through. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. All the necessary facilities, including free Wi-Fi in all rooms, gift/souvenir shop, taxi service, ticket service, 24-hour front desk, are at hand. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as television LCD/plasma screen, air purifier, clothes rack, complimentary instant coffee, complimentary tea. To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as massage. Convenience and comfort makes Kyoto Tower Hotel the perfect choice for your stay in Kyoto.Agoda

name: HOTEL THE MITSUI KYOTO, a Luxury Collection Hotel & Spa
description: Since ancient times, visitors to Kyoto, Japan have experienced the exquisite beauty of the natural world, where four seasons come and go in balanced succession. Our luxury Kyoto hotel harmonizes with nature, climate and history while harnessing our guests' pleasures as our own. This ideal, and the ties to traditional Japanese aesthetics and beliefs, is a part of our brand concept, EMBRACING JAPAN’S BEAUTY. From architecture and crafts to food and service, Kyoto culture and local customs shine through every detail of our hotel and infuse our meticulous, inviting hospitality. Be replenished with the natural spring water of our five star hotel in Kyoto’s private onsen thermal spa. Get energized in our fitness center open 24 hours a day. Delight in views of Kyoto or the garden from your luxury hotel room or suite with evening turndown, 24-hour room service and shoji room dividers. At HOTEL THE MITSUI KYOTO, a Luxury Collection Hotel and Spa, the authenticity of Japan is at the forefront of our service.Marriott

name: Ana Crowne Plaza Hotel Kyoto, An IHG Hotel
description: ANA Crowne Plaza Kyoto is situated right in front of the prominent world heritage site Nijo-Castle, surrounded by an abundance of greenery and seasonal flowers. Around the perimeter of the Nijo Castle is an ideal place for a jog or perhaps a stroll. Direct Shuttle Bus runs conveniently to and from JR Kyoto Station and Nijojo-mae Subway Station are located just a minute's walk away.  Nearby bus stops provide guests with easy access to major sightseeing spots, downtown areas as well as the Gion district, where guests may bump into a Geisha or Maiko on the way to work. ANA Crowne Plaza Kyoto is the ideal hotel for both sightseeing and business purposes. In each of our 6 restaurants, Japanese, Szechwan, French, Teppanyaki, Tempura as well as the Café, expert chefs proudly serve distinctive seasonal dishes which will surely be a feast for all our guest’s senses.  Also, guests can unwind in our lounge under the dynamic view of the 7m waterfall cascade or sink into a sofa in the member’s bar and enjoy the elegant and intimate setting over a drink. Our standard rooms, based around the color white, ensure tranquility, our spacious deluxe rooms provide warmth in abundance and our renovated rooms blend Kyoto tradition and modern stylishness. All guest rooms in the hotel are well appointed and equipped with high-speed Internet access via LAN and Wi-Fi, as well as a humidifier and VOD.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Karasuma Kyoto Hotel
description: Located near traditional houses and temples, contemporary Karasuma Kyoto Hotel offers easy access to transport links. It features a restaurant, a bar and rooms with free high-speed internet. Karasuma Kyoto Hotel is a less than a 5-minute stroll from both Karasuma Station and Shijo Station. It is a 10-minute walk from downtown area Shijo-Kawaramachi, and 20-minutes from Nijo Castle. The cosy rooms are fitted with air conditioning, heating and an en suite bathroom. They are comfortably furnished with satellite TV, a radio and a refrigerator. An air humidifier is available for rent. Karasuma Kyoto Hotel has a 24-hour front desk, which provides luggage storage and currency exchange. Laundry and ironing services are available. Restaurant Toh Lee serves authentic Chinese cuisine, and can arrange private dining rooms. Bar Anchor specialises in seasonal cocktails and whiskies, and there is a coffee shop on the lobby floor.

name: Rinn Shiki Juraku
description: No description found

name: Ishibekoji Muan
description: Located in Kyoto, less than 1 km from Gion Shijo Station, Ishibekoji Muan provides air-conditioned rooms and a bar. The property is around 1.9 km from Sanjusangen-do Temple, 2.3 km from Heian Shrine and 2.6 km from Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall. Kyoto International Manga Museum is 3 km away and TKP Garden City Kyoto is 3.2 km from the ryokan. Guest rooms in the ryokan are equipped with a coffee machine. Featuring a private bathroom with a bidet and slippers, rooms at Ishibekoji Muan also offer free WiFi. At the accommodation each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. An Asian breakfast is available daily at Ishibekoji Muan. At the ryokan guests are welcome to take advantage of a hot tub. Popular points of interest near Ishibekoji Muan include Samurai Kembu Kyoto, Kiyomizu-dera Temple and Shoren-in Temple. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 46 km from the accommodation.

name: The Ritz-Carlton, Kyoto
description: The Ritz-Carlton, Kyoto, the first luxury urban resort in Japan, sits on the banks of the Kamogawa River, with sweeping views of the famous Higashiyama mountains. This Kyoto, Japan hotel resort features 134 guest rooms with traditional Japanese motifs, four restaurants and bars including modern Japanese cuisine and a spa for the ultimate rejuvenation.Marriott

name: Garrya Nijo Castle Kyoto
description: Japan's sense of beauty' was historical cultivated in Kyoto. The roots came from how 'nature' and 'people' faces the other. These intangible values are offered as experiences to guests worldwide. At this 'imperial villa' provides Japan's sense of beauty t hrough the elements adopted from the Shoin-zukuri style traditional samurai residence.accorhotels.com

name: Kagan Hotel & Hostel
description: Attractively set in the centre of Kyoto, Kagan Hotel & Hostel is within 2.1 km of Kyoto Station and 2.2 km of TKP Garden City Kyoto. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a shared kitchen and a shared lounge, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking is available on site. Rooms are fitted with a coffee machine, while certain rooms come with a kitchenette with a fridge, a microwave and a toaster. Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall is 3.1 km from the hostel, while Sanjusangen-do Temple is 3.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 43 km from Kagan Hotel & Hostel.

name: Ariston Hotel Kyoto Jujo
description: Conveniently located just a 3-minute walk away from Jujo Station of Kyoto, Ariston Hotel Kyoto Jujo offers rooms with minimalist designs. The hotel is non-smoking throughout and offers a designated smoking area on site. There is a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi throughout the property. Accessible parking is provided. Guests can enjoy the view of the city from their rooms during their stay. At the hotel, every room is air conditioned and has sound proofing. Guest rooms are equipped with a portable WiFi device, an electric kettle and a flat-screen TV. The en suite bathrooms come with a bath or shower, toilet and free toiletries. A hairdryer is also included for guest's convenience. There is a shared lounge at Ariston Hotel Kyoto Jujo. Free luggage storage is provided for guests during their stay. Dry cleaning and laundry services can be provided for an additional fee. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the property. There is a restaurant on site. Guests can take a 15-minute stroll to visit the popular destination, Tofuku-ji Temple, for local sightseeing. Kiyomizu-dera Temple is approximately 40 minutes away via bus and train. Kyoto Station is a 6-minute train ride from the property on Karasuma Line. The nearest airport is Osaka Itami Airport, 36 km from Ariston Hotel Kyoto Jujo.

name: Nazuna Kyoto Gosho
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a soaking tub and an outdoor private bath, as well as a rainfall showerhead and free WiFi. Other amenities include premium bedding, a pillowtop bed, down comforters, and towels.Expedia

name: Rc Hotel Kyoto Yasaka
description: Providing free WiFi and a garden in a renovated 50-year old building with mountain views from the property, Rc Hotel Kyoto Yasaka offers accommodation in Kyoto, 600 metres from Kiyomizu-dera Temple. This 2-star inn has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom. The property is a 16-minute walk from Samurai Kembu Kyoto. Views include Hokanji Temple from the property. At the inn, all rooms have a desk. Guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Heian Shrine is 2 km from RC HOTEL KYOTO YASAKA, while Kyoto International Manga Museum is 2.3 km from the property. Osaka Itami Airport is 39 km away.

name: Gallery Nozawa Inn
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a hydromassage showerhead and a refrigerator, as well as free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, slippers, and kitchenware and utensils.Expedia

name: Hotel Keihan Kyoto Grande
description: Hotel Keihan Kyoto is directly connected to JR Kyoto Train Station by an underground passage. It offers massage services and a 24-hour front desk. The modern rooms come with free Wi-Fi access. Guest rooms offer both air conditioning and heating facilities. Each room has an electric kettle, a fridge and a flat-screen TV. The en suite bathroom comes with toiletries and a bathtub. Bath amenities including a toothbrush set, hairdryers and slippers are provided. Kyoto Keihan Hotel is a 10-minute walk from Higashi Hongan-ji Temple and a 15-minute walk from To-ji Temple. Kansai International Airport is a 2-hour ride and Itami Airport is a 1-hour ride away on the limousine bus. The limousine bus stop is located right in front of the hotel. Luggage storage and dry cleaning services are provided at the front desk. At restaurant Octavar, guests can enjoy Mediterranean cuisine with fine wines. Guests can purchase beverages from the drinks vending machine on site, or look through Kyoto tour books at the common area. A currency exchange machine can be found on site.

name: Nazuna Kyoto Nijo-tei
description: Located in Central Kyoto, this ryokan is within walking distance of the Kyoto International Manga Museum and Nijo Castle. It also offers a 24-hour reception, 24-hour room service and free Wi-Fi. There are a range of amenities available to those staying at NAZUNA Kyoto Nijo-tei, including a safe, a concierge and luggage storage. Additionally, the multilingual staff are on hand to provide local information. The rooms are air conditioned and include an oversized bathtub, a private courtyard and a private garden. All individual bathrooms offer slippers, a hair dryer and a rain shower. They are also equipped with a flat-screen TV and tatami mats. NAZUNA Kyoto Nijo-tei is close to Marutamachi Station, making it easy for guests to travel around Kyoto and its surrounding areas. Gion, Kinkaku-ji and Kyoto Tower are just a short car ride from the ryokan.Revato

name: Hotel Resol Trinity Kyoto
description: Featuring a garden, a restaurant as well as a bar, Hotel Resol Trinity Kyoto is located in the centre of Kyoto, 700 metres from Kyoto International Manga Museum. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. Heian Shrine is 2.1 km away and Shoren-in Temple is 2.3 km from the hotel. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a buffet or an American breakfast. Popular points of interest near Hotel Resol Trinity Kyoto include Samurai Kembu Kyoto, Gion Shijo Station and Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 46 km from the accommodation.

name: Sakura Terrace
description: Open from October 2013, Sakura Terrace is only a 6-minute walk from Kyoto Station’s Hachijo-Higashi Exit. It features free WiFi throughout, and it has a free-use launderette. The hotel is a few steps from Kujo Subway Station. Rooms feature an interior in neutral colours, an LCD TV with cable channels and a fridge. They boast a combined air conditioning and air cleaning unit, while toiletries are provided. Hotel Sakura Terrace offers a restaurant and a bar counter. Spacious public baths, male-only saunas and female-only ceramic-bed sauna are available. Guests can enjoy a complimentary welcome drink at the bar counter. Kyoto Tower is a 10-minute walk from the hotel, while Toji Temple is a 15-minute walk. The property is a 1-minute walk to the bus stop for Kiyomizu-dera Temple/Gion area, and a 3-minute walk to the bus stop for Kinkaku-ji Temple.
